name: Alone in Space (itch)
description:
Alone in space.

Travel the galaxy in hope to one day return home.
Will you also find your lost crew mates?
-----------------------------

Wow. What a weekend. Total crunch the last 10 hours, and I am so tired right now.

Didn't have time to make any sound, which is quite the bummer. The effects also didn't get the attention they deserved.

I hope it isn't to unclear as to what to do. There is a tutorial, consisting of some images.

Thank you to my friends for being inspiration for the names of the stars!

EDIT: After playing it now, I have realized that I have accidentally messed up the story objectives.. It says your home is Iris II and your crew is at Mangia I. However, because I finished that feature around 20 minutes before deadline, I must have made a mistake and as such the truth is the opposite! Your crew is at Iris II and your home, and final goal is at Mangia I.

Tools used
------------
Unity
Blender
Gimp
